Title: Custom Tab Container/Panels
Description: Project to develop the tab functionality for custom color tabs, background and display.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Project to develop the tab functionality for custom color tabs, background and display.

Additional information on starting a new project is available here: Project Startup Guide.

I am looking to develop the AJAX control toolkit item TAB control/panel initially. Not necessarily as an extender but as a full control that is customizable in regards to background color, tab image structure, tab layout style, etc.
